title: (x) Looking for Linotype font with play cards - Game Pi {Dav}
content:
Hi all,

I just want somebody to help me find out a font name. I remember there is a font of Linotype about playcard, I also saw it once. Though I can’t remember its name now and find anything about it, even through Linotype.com . I hope you can help me, thank you very much!

Yours faithfully  
Typo\*

 [‹ (x) VIEW logo - Bernhard Modern {Grant}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071016232726/http:/typophile.com/node/12812 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) HM Revenue & Customs - custom typeface by Miles Newlyn {Miles} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071016232726/http:/typophile.com/node/12797 "Go to next forum topic")
author: typo

comments.content:
formlos,

Thank you for helping me! That’s it!

Yours sincerely  
Typo\*
